summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 9, Plat of Aero Heights No. 2, being the alley between 38th Ave. Southwest and 39th Ave. Southwest from Southwest Graham Street to Southwest Raymond Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 18489 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement by made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
